mapper.insert: insert into common_region (common_region_id, par_region_id, region_name, region_py_name, region_nbr, region_type, region_desc, region_level, region_sort, province_nbr, city_flag, status_cd, create_staff, UPDATE_STAFF, create_date, status_date, update_date, remark, C4_REGION_ID) values (#{commonRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionPyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionSort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provinceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c4RegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update common_region set par_region_id = #{parRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_py_name = #{regionPyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_nbr = #{regionNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_type = #{regionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_desc = #{regionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_level = #{regionLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, region_sort = #{regionSort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province_nbr = #{provinceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_flag = #{cityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_cd = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_staff = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status_date = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C4_REGION_ID = #{c4RegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where common_region_id = #{commonRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select common_region_id, par_region_id, region_name, region_py_name, region_nbr, region_type, region_desc, region_level, region_sort, province_nbr, city_flag, status_cd, create_staff, UPDATE_STAFF, create_date, status_date, update_date, remark, C4_REGION_ID from common_region where common_region_id = #{commonRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select common_region_id, par_region_id, region_name, region_py_name, region_nbr, region_type, region_desc, region_level, region_sort, province_nbr, city_flag, status_cd, create_staff, UPDATE_STAFF, create_date, status_date, update_date, remark, C4_REGION_ID from common_region where c4_region_id = #{c4RegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select common_region_id, par_region_id, region_name, region_py_name, region_nbr, region_type, region_desc, region_level, region_sort, province_nbr, city_flag, status_cd, create_staff, UPDATE_STAFF, create_date, status_date, update_date, remark, C4_REGION_ID from common_region
